useCase.name: View Builds
useCase.description: As a DevSecOpsManager, I want to view the list of builds

preconditions.precondition: There are builds available for viewing

successEndConditions.condition: The list of builds is successfully displayed to the user

useCase.trigger: DevSecOpsManager selects the option to view builds

mainSequence.step: DevSecOpsManager requests to view the list of builds
DevSecOpsManager sends the request to the DevSecOps Service Orchestrator Manager
The Service Orchestrator Manager provides the list of builds to DevSecOpsManager
DevSecOpsManager views the list of builds
